name: NFT Art Heist
description:
Psst...

Hey, you. Yeah you, c'mere.

You know NFTs? Expensive, right? Well, what if you could fake 'em? We got 100% gin-yu-wine fake NFTs here. You can even make your own NFTs and sell them for a profit. I'll be your "business partner," yeah, your "business partner."

Just use your mouse and keyboard inside this here browser window, and take a look at some of my contracts. All 100% real NFT priceless artworks. Er, well, there is a price tag on them, but you can charge whatever you want once you've stolen them. As long as you can fool the appraiser, it can be worth ANYTHING, baby!

I'll handle all the transactions too, just let me know your price and when you're ready to sell and I'll find a buyer. In the meantime, you can shop around. If you see something you like, maybe you can sell it at a profit. Or better yet, make even more copies!

Hahahahaha. Haaa, yeah that's good.

Anyways, you in? I know you're in, just click the Play button already.
